name: Fiery Cat-astrophe
description:
Oh no! Cats have hijacked all the Fire Engines! Even worse block town is ablaze! We can only hope the cats are familiar with fire fighting protocols!

1 to 4 competitive game. Put out the fires to gain points, or steal the points of others. The cat with the most points at the end wins!

Controls:

Left Stick :           Move

Right Stick :        Aim

Right Trigger:   Shoot Water
